name: CONHEXTED #oneminutejam
description:
CONHEXTED: Hexagon Connections Introduction

Get the highest score you can in one minute! Placing hexagons will give you points, connecting 3 or more hexagons together will increase your multiplier! You can also stack hexagons to make tricky connections, but this will lose you points and multiplier so watch out!

CONHEXTED was created in approximately a week for the #oneminutejam. As such it is very minimalistic, but I hope you have fun.

Quick Rules

🐁💨 Move with the mouse!
👈📌 Place a collection of hex tiles with a left-click
👉🔄 Rotate the collection of tiles anti-clockwise with your right-click
⏱️📈 Get a high score in one minute! Leave a comment with your high score! (Mine is about 210,000)
🎷🐞 There might be bugs! It's a jam game!

Notes

Thanks for playing the game! If you like what you see then please put a comment below and I'll consider expanding this into a full game. You can find me on Twitter @btsherratt

Unfortunately, the game as it stands has no support for colorblind users. I attempted to add this within the jam but it was quite tricky owing to shapes overlapping on placement. I will be looking to address this in a future release.
